text: yahoodee aur eesaee kahate hai, "ham to allaah ke bete aur usake chahete hai." kaho, "phir vah tumhen tumhaare gunaahon par dand kyon deta hai? baat yah nahin hai, balki tum bhee usake paida kie hue praaniyon mein se ek manushy ho. vah jise chaahe kshama kare aur jise chaahe dand de." aur allaah hee ke lie hai baadashaahee aakaashon aur dharatee ko aur jo kuchh unake beech hai vah bhee, aur jaana bhee usee kee or hai
